data.title: Fun store!
data.text: This place is like going back in history.  They have all of the old sodas and candies and signs and lunch boxes that I grew up with and it is so easy to spend a long time in there.  Plus the employees are extra friendly

data.title: Lots of choices, but pricey
data.text: Cute shop with lots of choices especially with candies not widely sold, but be prepared to spend money, try to find a coupon!

data.title: A fun place for soda and candy lovers
data.text:
If you love root beer, soda or candy, this is the place to go. You will find all sorts of obscure brands and flavors of all kinds. Personally mix and match 6-packs for a variety.

I get my dad different root beer from here for special occasions.

data.title: Fun Store not a Restaurant
data.text:
I always buy more stuff there than I should.  Then, I end up eating it.  It's kind of fun when you are in your __ years to go to a place that has the candies you bought when you were a child.  My Mom is about to have her 90th birthday next month & I even found some items that my she used to buy when she was a kid!  She was delighted!  My husband & I had to try some of the unusual sodas there.  Not all are yummy, but all are interesting.  

Every time I go, the salesperson there has such personality.  It's fun just to stop in and talk, but I could never do that because I am compelled to buy something whenever I'm in Rocket Fizz.

data.title: Sodas You've Never Seen
data.text:
This is a great place to visit to find something new and interesting.  Their selection of roasted crickets was dissapointing, but it gave me something new to try.  They have a great many sodas in various flavors, a few dozen types of candies, and odd gift ideas on hand.
Some of their staff are terrific to meet and are interesting people to chat with while you find what you're looking for, or have them recommend something to you based on your tastes.
Even if you don't like sodas or candy, or odd gifts, it makes a nice little stop to just browse their five aisles for a few minutes on your way someplace else.

data.title: Fascinating store
data.text: Literally a time machine filled with nostalgia. Candy and soft drinks I have not seen for fifty years filled the shelves. Perhaps Rod Serling might appear in the corner and explain that I had passed into the Twilight Zone. It's that type of place.
